div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1617 Palestine, before 1942 Burial: after 61 B.C. (Spaer) Contents: 30+ AR Antiochus VII: 1+ tetradr. (Tyre, yr. 181) Demetrius II: 4 tetradr. (Tyre, yrs. 184, 186) Tyre: 10 tetradr. (yrs. 45-64) Disposition: A. Spaer, Jerusalem, 14 Kadman, INCJ, hoard 14 Information from A. Spaer. The hd. contained at least 15 more tetradr. of Antiochus VII and Demetrius II from Tyre
